description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing rear extension and conservatory); alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension incorporating Juliet balconies; installation of three rooflights to the front roof slope: alterations to fenestration to side elevation incorporating replacement first floor window and ground floor high level window and door; alterations to existing front garden and formation of crossover to provide vehicular parking space and addition of rainwater downpipes to front and rear elevations
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Proposed Elevation Plan drawing no.A-2020 Rev P1, Existing and Proposed Sections drawing no.A-3010 Rev P1 and Proposed Frontage Plan drawing no.A-1016- Rev P2

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building and shall be consistent with those listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).
| The proposed windows to the flank elevation (main property) shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level and remain in perpetuity.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021, policies 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (2021), policy 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and policy DAA of Elaing's Local Plan 2023 (Reg.19)
